group_1.narration: With the help of Kanoko Yayoi,@the first Magical Girl I met in Kamihama,@we defeated the ex-Nagisa!
And! After that,@Kanoko brought me to the Western restaurant "Walnuts,"@where I finally obtained my dearly-wished-for...!

group_1.textLeft: Here's your order!
Cheese gratin with cheese risotto,@cheese Hamburg steak...
In short, a full course of cheese, cheese, cheese!

group_1.textRight: Woaaaah~!

group_1.textLeft: Eat up now! It's my treat.

group_1.textRight: I hereby dig iiiin!!
Omf, homf, nomf...
...Mmm~m! It's delicious!

group_1.textLeft: I'm so glad to hear you're enjoying it!
So... back to our discussion just now.
Kanoko-san was attacked by a Witch. And a@particularly dangerous one, at that...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it was really rough. I thought I'd killed it,@but then...
This THING came out of its mouth!@It was seriously freaky...!
But that's when our Magical Girl friend@Nameko-chan showed up...
Excuse you, it's NAGISA!@And thank you for the meal!

group_1.textLeft: That was fast!
She just swallowed it all right up...!

group_1.textRight: Yep! I'm very scrumptiously satisfied...!

group_1.textLeft: Wow...
...So, like, after that...
She bailed me out just as I thought I was done for.

group_1.textRight: And then I had my fill of cheese, which brings us to now!

group_1.textLeft: ...@Speaking of which.
We came this whole way without me asking you,@but why DID you want all this cheese?

group_1.textRight: Because I LOVE cheese, of course!

group_1.textLeft: You wanted to eat it... because you just love it?

group_1.textRight: AND because I needed it to come up with@a strategy!

group_1.textLeft: A strategy?
For what, exactly...?

group_1.textRight: For that Witch we just fought. It's not dead yet...!

group_1.textLeft: Uh? Huh? What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: It multiplies way, way faster than any@normal Witch!
By now, it's probably already spread to every corner@of this town...!

group_1.textLeft: What?! S-seriously...?!
Throughout all of Kamihama...?!

group_1.textRight: If you go out and investigate for yourself,@that's bound to be what you'll find...

group_1.textLeft: D-doesn't this mean we have a huge problem@on our hands?!
Oh, geeze... so there's tons more of that Witch?
Just one of them was enough trouble already...

group_1.textRight: Yes! Honestly, she's just SO pesky.
A Witch dangerous enough to kill even a strong@Magical Girl if they were caught off guard...
And there's tons of her surging up all throughout@town!
At this point, simply fighting won't be enough!
We need a good, strong strategy if we want to root@her out!

group_1.textLeft: So what's your strategy...?

group_1.textRight: ...Hee hee hee...
It hasn't hit me yet!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Ngah...!

group_1.textRight: Well, I'm sure I'll have a lightbulb moment@if I just eat a little more cheese...

group_1.textLeft: You want more?! Sheesh.
...Hm? Wait, hang on a second.
Y'know, just from the way you're talking about it...
Do you... happen to be familiar with this Witch?

group_1.textRight: Oh, absolutely!

group_1.textLeft: ...So what IS that Witch, exactly?

group_1.textRight: Why, it's Nagisa's...!

group_1.textLeft: Your...?!

group_1.textRight: (...Ah! This is bad!)
(I can't go and tell them about how that Witch@used to be Nagisa...)
(They'll just be confused! Or worse...)
(Nagisa's friendship level with them will drop!)
Um... it's Nagisa's...

group_1.textLeft: It's your...

group_1.textRight: Nagisa's... Witch that I've been hunting for a long@time now!

group_1.textLeft: One you've been hunting?

group_1.textRight: I chased it all the way to this town, which is how@I came here. Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Does that mean that other towns are in massive@trouble like we are?!
Yeah, with such a strong Witch multiplying@and spreading like crazy...

group_1.textRight: Well, um. Yes.@It... WAS a lot of trouble.

group_1.textLeft: So if that Witch was running away from you...@You must've had it cornered really well!

group_1.textRight: Y-yes!
(Well, Nagisa was actually the one running...)

group_1.textLeft: How'd you manage to force it into running away@like that?
Aha...! Should we just do the same thing here@in Kamihama?
Oh, yeah! That's it! That should work for a strategy,@right?

group_1.textRight: W-well, um...
(Shoot! My attempts at misdirection have gone@completely south...!)
(Ummm... what now, what now...?)
Well, in the previous towns, I just sort of...@lucked into it.
Like, there was a string of really fortunate@coincidences, and eventually I'd defeated it.
...But! There was one left over, and it drifted over@into this town...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! I... I see...

group_1.textRight: Therefore! We need a strategy this time,@not just dumb luck!
So we can completely eradicate it for good!

group_1.textLeft: Well, all right then...

group_1.textRight: And thus!
We'll need the help of as many Magical Girls as we@can get!
If you want to exterminate even one of those@Witches...
It's crucial that you keep attacking as a team,@en masse, with no breaks!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that'd be tough on your own.
So, we'd better stay on the offensive, one girl after@another...
To make sure it doesn't suddenly regenerate and@catch us off guard!
I fought it myself, so I can tell that's the way to go!
That said...
If the number of individual Witches keeps growing,@we'll be needing quite a large group...
Should we form several teams, and have those@teams steadily take them all out?
Yeah... so we'd better get everyone up to speed,@fast!

group_1.textRight: We've got to sound the alarm throughout all of@Kamihama before it's too late!
It's a race against the clock!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah!
(She was just gorging herself on cheese until@a minute ago, though...)

group_1.textRight: This is a full-scale battle between Kamihama@and the Witch!
(Phew... I managed to stay on top of the@conversation somehow.)

group_1.textLeft: So, we'll go call up all the Magical Girls we know...

group_1.textRight: And in the meantime, Nagisa shall investigate@throughout the city!
If we want to build our strategy, we first require@a good grasp of the turf!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! W-wait, wait!
You just said that acting alone would be dangerous,@right?!

group_1.textRight: I won't be fighting any Witches, so I'll be fine!
And with that, I'm off!
Uyaaaaaaah!
There she goes...

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure she'll be okay...?

group_1.textCenter: One step out from the shop, and I'm suddenly@somewhere sickeningly sweet...

group_1.textRight: [chara:200701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]There she is, as quick as ever...!
Things are definitely NOT fine!
Help! I've got to call for HELP!
Kanokooooo! Manakaaaaa!
